entities.description: Respondent's desire to stop or cut down hallucinogen use in the past 12 months.
Long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or worsened by hallucinogen use in the past 12 months.
Continued use of hallucinogens despite causing long-lasting or repeated physical health problems.
Long-lasting or repeated emotional or mental health problems caused or worsened by hallucinogen use in the past 12 months.
The individual answering the survey questions.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent wishes to stop or cut down hallucinogen use.
Indicates whether the respondent has experienced long-lasting physical health problems due to hallucinogen use.
Indicates whether the respondent continued to use hallucinogens despite physical health problems.
Indicates whether the respondent has experienced long-lasting mental health problems due to hallucinogen use.
